Enam Bosokah bụ onye Ghana na-ese ihe
A maara ya maka ihe osise pen ya.
Bosokah gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology, ebe ọ gụrụ gbasara ịkpụ ihe ọkpụkpụ
Banyere nhọrọ ya maka ihe ọ ga-eji, ọ na-ekwu na "Pen bụ ihe na-achọghi nnukwu ego; anaghị m azụta ọtụtụ ihe
Ojiji m ji pen bụ iji gosi na ihe ndị ahụ anyị na-eleda anya nwere ike ịmepụta nnukwu ihe
" N'akụkụ pen, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe ndị ọzọ dị ka icheku ọkụ na mmiri
E gosipụtala nka ya n'ime na n'èzí Afrịka.

Bosokah rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka ikpe na BIC Art Master Competition, asọmpi maka ndị na-ese bọlbụ pen nke Africa, nke Société Bic mere kemgbe 2017. O meela ihe osise maka Wiki Unseen, mmekorita nke Wikimedia Foundation nke ebumnuche ya bụ inye ihe ngosi maka akụkọ ndụ BIPOC Wikipedia n'enweghị ihe oyiyi nke isiokwu ahụ.
Dịka n'afọ 2022, ọ bi na Accra.
